TaskDescription.Summary: Capture the screen that changes every moment.
TaskDescription.Detail: Capture consecutively the screen that changes every second and save it.

Assist.value: Open a browser and access Naver.
Enter the URL to connect to. Type 'https://www.naver.com'
Click Run button below and open a browser.
Specify the number of iterations. Enter 5.
Take a screenshot of a section of the browser.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the section below the login box.
Increment this.count as it captures and add it to the end of the file name. Enter the capture path as below. Global.ProjectDir+'partCapture'+(++this.count)+'.png'
As the names of the captured objects are not identical, disenable the option to uncheck their names.
Set a time interval between captures.
Enter the time interval in seconds. Type 2.
